title: Russia accused of blocking experts access to Douma
text:
Russia accused of blocking experts' access to Douma 4:49am EDT - 01:56 
The United States accused Russia on Monday of blocking international inspectors from reaching the site of a suspected poison gas attack in Syria and said Russians or Syrians may have tampered with evidence on the ground. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The United States accused Russia on Monday of blocking international inspectors from reaching the site of a suspected poison gas attack in Syria and said Russians or Syrians may have tampered with evidence on the ground.
